title: Ep. - 385 - GIRARDI CASE UPDATE LOS ANGELES TIMES REPORTERS HARRIET RYAN AND MATT HAMILTON
description:
Kate discusses what to watch this week, and the upcoming Lularich docuseries on Amazon Prime.

 

Pulitzer prize winning journalists Harriet Ryan and Matt Hamilton have been covering the case of the unraveling of Tom Girardi’s legal career, his firm, and his marriage to Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Erika Girardi.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: https://twitter.com/katecasey

Clubhouse: @katecasey
